title: Keen 1 Help
content:
Hallo,
I have done all the levels of keen 1, but somehow i missed the liquid bottle I need for my ship. Now everywhere is the sign DONE on the level symbols, and I can't go in again.
How the hell can I go in again and find the last missing part of my ship??????????????
It really makes me crazy, any offered help would be graciously accepted (;
THANK YOU GUYS, ME
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img]

title: Re: Keen 1 Help
content: I'm sorry, but there is no way other than to restart the game and get the everclear..Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Keen 1 Help
content:
Lol... i did that once... wasted so much time. Hey! doesn't Xtra have a savegame utility on his site?

Just mark all the lvls as done, except the last one...

Or just start over...

title: Re: Keen 1 Help
content:
Well; you can use the Keen editing programs to build a new level and add an everclear.

But really, you should've used other savegame slots, that way if you miss something you can go back.

title: Re: Keen 1 Help
content:
Hey Guys,
again I could need some professional help
I finally got into the hidden city of Keen 1. But now, how the hell can I come out again. I see the exit door behind a wall, but I simply can't get to it...any ideas?
helpful advices are welcome!!! Yours, Elvenn![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

title: Re: Keen 1 Help
content:
Tell you what. Since you got to do the game all over, for each level you enter, just type GOD and you'll waltz through all the levels without you having to go through all that time again.

On the final level where the bottle is placed, don't allow yourself to be sucked into the exit door. Just keep the pogo stick on until you get the bottle and then turn off the pogo stick and exit.

Hope this helps.

title: Re: Keen 1 Help
content: Also, about the hidden city level. After finishing it, on the main map, get to that white object and as usual teleport just like you did from the first half to the second half.

title: Re: Keen 1 Help
content:

title: Re: Keen 1 Help
content:
Hi Elvenn... I assume you're having trouble finding your way out of the actual level, not in using the teleporter.

It's tough to describe, so I'll instead direct you to Spatang's very handy [url=http://dosclassics.com/keen/map.php?a=1&l=14]map of that level[/url].[url=http://www.screenhog.com]www.screenhog.com[/url]
